author: Special Correspondent
text:
S. Sampath, Chief Executive Operations, Velmurugan Industries, and R. Anbarasu, Deputy General Manager (HR), SRF Limited, have been nominated chairman and vice-chairman, respectively, of the Confederation of Indian Industry, Tiruchi zone, for 2016-17.

Mr. Sampath has previously served as president of the BIDASS and secretary of the BHEL Small and Medium Industries Association.

He was the vice-chairman of the CII, Tiruchi zone, in 2015-16, according to a CII release.
title: CII Tiruchi Zone office-bearers
